trans-unit.source: Represents the International Color Consortium (ICC) or Image Color Management (ICM) color profile that is associated with a bitmap image.
The supported standard color spaces are sRGB, ScRGB, RGB, CMYK, Gray, Multichannel, and unknown.

Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile located at a given <xref href="System.Uri"></xref>.

To use any of the unsupported color profiles, you must install one and use its URI to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
The <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> that identifies the location of the desired color profile.

Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> with the standard color profile (sRGB or RGB ) that most closely matches the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> from which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> is derived.
Determines whether an <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is equal to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to compare for equality.
`true` if the supplied <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is equal to this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the hash code for this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> that represents the hash code for the object.
Operates on two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to determine equality.
The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
`true` if the instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Operates on two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to determine that they are not equal.
The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
`true` if the instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> are not equal; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a readable <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> of raw color profile data.
A readable <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> of raw color profile data.

Gets a <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile.

A <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile.
